QuestData.Title: Moving Target
QuestData.Description: Karg's captors are moving east - probably retreating to Grom'gar with their tails between their legs!$B$BThey think they outrun me, but Asha here is the fastest thing on four legs. We'll run them down in the Icewind Drifts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Catch up with Lokra in the Icewind Drifts.
QuestData.RewardText: <Lokra's gaze remains fixed on her dying frost wolf.>$B$BWe had them... We had them, Asha. You were so fast. So beautiful.$B$BI failed you, Asha. I am sorry.
